languages.text: {n}Пятно радостно трясется, слегка повизгивая. Словно сквозь толщу воды до вас доносится:{/n} "Горд кафтан, горд кафтан!"
{n}The blob wiggles and shakes as it yelps out your orders. Its muffled voice sounds as though it is coming to you from underwater.{/n} "Board cabin! Board cabin!"
languages.original_text: {n}Пятно радостно трясется, слегка повизгивая. Словно сквозь толщу воды до вас доносится:{/n} "Горд кафтан, горд кафтан!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The blob shakes energetically and lets out a few yelps. As if through a mass of water, you hear it relaying your orders:{/n} "Bored button! Bored button!"
{n}The blob shakes energetically and lets out a few yelps. As if through a mass of water, you hear it relaying your orders:{/n} "Bored button! Bored button!"
{n}The blob wiggles and shakes as it yelps out your orders. Its muffled voice sounds as though it is coming to you from underwater.{/n} "Board cabin! Board cabin!"
{n}The blob wiggles and shakes as it yelps out your orders. Its muffled voice sounds as though it is coming to you from underwater.{/n} "Board cabin! Board cabin!"
{n}The blob wiggles and shakes as it yelps out your orders. Its muffled voice sounds as though it is coming to you from underwater.{/n} "Board cabin! Board cabin!"
{n}The blob wiggles and shakes as it yelps out your orders. Its muffled voice sounds as though it is coming to you from underwater.{/n} "Board cabin! Board cabin!"

languages.text: {n}La silhouette gesticule et se tortille en répétant vos ordres d'une voix étouffée qui donne l'impression qu'elle crie sous l'eau.{/n} « Abordez la cabine ! Abordez la cabine ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The blob wiggles and shakes as it yelps out your orders. Its muffled voice sounds as though it is coming to you from underwater.{/n} "Board cabin! Board cabin!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La silhouette gesticule et se tortille en répétant vos ordres d'une voix étouffée qui donne l'impression qu'elle crie sous l'eau.{/n} « Abordez la cabine ! Abordez la cabine ! »

languages.text: {n}La masa se contonea y se agita al darte órdenes. Su voz ahogada parece provenir de debajo del agua.{/n} «¡Por la mitad! ¡Por la mitad!».
languages.original_text: {n}The blob wiggles and shakes as it yelps out your orders. Its muffled voice sounds as though it is coming to you from underwater.{/n} "Board cabin! Board cabin!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La masa se contonea y se agita al darte órdenes. Su voz ahogada parece provenir de debajo del agua.{/n} «¡Por la mitad! ¡Por la mitad!».

languages.text: {n}眼前的斑点对你的命令有了反应。它一边摆动，一遍摇晃，低沉的声音听起来就像是从水下传来的一样。{/n}“箭长打人！箭长打人！”
languages.original_text: {n}The blob wiggles and shakes as it yelps out your orders. Its muffled voice sounds as though it is coming to you from underwater.{/n} "Board cabin! Board cabin!"

traits.locale_text: {n}眼前的斑点对你的命令有了反应。它一边摆动，一遍摇晃，低沉的声音听起来就像是从水下传来的一样。{/n}“箭长打人！箭长打人！”

languages.text: {n}あなたの命令を叫びながら、塊はくねくねと揺れ動いた。そのくぐもった声は、まるで水中から聞こえてくるようだ。 {/n}「キャビンに乗れ！キャビンに乗れ！」
languages.original_text: {n}The blob wiggles and shakes as it yelps out your orders. Its muffled voice sounds as though it is coming to you from underwater.{/n} "Board cabin! Board cabin!"

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの命令を叫びながら、塊はくねくねと揺れ動いた。そのくぐもった声は、まるで水中から聞こえてくるようだ。 {/n}「キャビンに乗れ！キャビンに乗れ！」

languages.text: {n}Der Blob wackelt und zittert, während er deine Befehle herausplärrt. Seine gedämpfte Stimme klingt, als würde sie von unter Wasser zu dir dringen.{/n} "Alle an Bord! Alle an Bord!"
languages.original_text: {n}The blob wiggles and shakes as it yelps out your orders. Its muffled voice sounds as though it is coming to you from underwater.{/n} "Board cabin! Board cabin!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Blob wackelt und zittert, während er deine Befehle herausplärrt. Seine gedämpfte Stimme klingt, als würde sie von unter Wasser zu dir dringen.{/n} "Alle an Bord! Alle an Bord!"

languages.text: {n}Kütle, kıvrılarak ve sarsılarak emirlerini haykırıyor. Sesi su altından geliyormuş gibi boğuk çıkıyor.{/n} "Kabini bordalayın! Kabini bordalayın!"
languages.original_text: {n}The blob wiggles and shakes as it yelps out your orders. Its muffled voice sounds as though it is coming to you from underwater.{/n} "Board cabin! Board cabin!"
